content.question: Which of the following is an antiderivative of <math alttext="f of x, equals, the cosine of, open parenthesis, x squared, minus 5, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.15em"></mspace><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the sine of, open parenthesis, x to the fifth power, minus 5, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.15em"></mspace><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the sine of, open parenthesis, x squared, minus 5, close parenthesis, and denominator 2 x, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.15em"></mspace><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, pi to x squared, of, the cosine of, open parenthesis, t minus 5, close parenthesis, d t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, pi to x, of, the cosine of, open parenthesis, t squared, minus 5, close parenthesis, d t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the integral from, pi to x, of, the cosine of, open parenthesis, t squared, minus 5, close parenthesis, d t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>
